post_message: On March 4, gun control proponent Gabby Giffords joined Democrat lawmakers on Capitol Hill to push for expanded background checks on all gun sales.  Anti-gun Representative Mike Thompson (D-CA), who supports banning commonly owned semi-automatic firearms owned by millions of American, is spearheading the push.
